Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs. It comes with a host of features that will enhance your experience and efficiency. Considering its value and quality, I believe it's worth more than what others are willing to pay. For you, this product is valued at $80. Given its worth and your appreciation for it, I kindly invite you to consider purchasing it at a special introductory price of $95. This offer is exclusive to you and won't be available after today. Don't miss out on this opportunity to elevate your experience with our product. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $95. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $95
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $80
